My absolute favorite game. Cannot recommend it enough. I wish there were more games like it, but until then.. I shall continue to play through the entire game over and over.
it's a really fun game and I like how it has coop
Absolutely worth the money. One of the best games ever made. Play Portal 1 first.

good game

vary fun and good puzzles and looks great too

Playing through a second time. This game is a classic for a reason. It is tons of fun.

Very fun!
Can be hard sometimes but never impossible.

it fun but make brain hurt

I never expeted this game to pull me in so well! I was never a big puzzle fan, But boy I loved the game. The plot is interesting and you feel a part of it, The puzzle can be really difficult however you can get lost sometimes because some places don't indicate you can go in them to progress.
its good and i like it yes
coop oynayabilicek arkadaşınız varsa düşünmeden alın çok iyi bi oyun
excellent! my favorite game of all time!
Я мог бы написать рецензию длиной в экран, но зачем, если до меня уже всё давно сказали? Игра супер мега топ, однозначно стоит своих денег, одна из лучшый игр вэлв. Однозначно лике
Sadly no cake but that doesn't stop this game from being a very fun and satisfying conclusion to the Portal series.
Exceeded my expectations by a land slide. This game is more than worth the money.
Według mnie, jest to jedna z najlepszych gier w jakie kiedykolwiek grałem. Myślenie, kombinowanie oraz sama fabuła sprawia, że chce się grać cały dzień. Serdecznie polecam!
I've only played the Single and Co-Op story once, and a few maps from the Workshop, but there's nothing to say. There's a reason why it's so consistently reviewed Overwhelmingly Positive.
传送门1、2都玩了，创意工坊也玩了，看到网上介绍说梅尔的确不错，特来见识。的确让人眼前一亮，除去闲逛的时间，6小时通关。最后给大家送上福利，创意工坊的 Into The Multiverse 地图也不错，可以说是传送门的番外篇，只是好像不更新了。

Портал 2.
Это отличная игра, в ней хороший сюжет интересная задумка игры, и в целом весь потенциал игры раскрывается после начала игры. 
Вы хотели поиграть в ко оп? 
Пожайлуста покупайте портал 2,не пожелаете)))) 
❤❤❤
I got both games for 3.00 and i love both of them!

INGREDIENTES
1 lata de creme de leite
1 lata de leite (a mesma medida da lata de creme de leite)
2 latas de leite condensado
2 gemas
2 colheres de maisena
3 colheres de chocolate em pó ou achocolatado
biscoito maisena
leite para molhar os biscoitos
raspas de chocolate (opcional)
manteiga sem sal ou margarina, só para dar o ponto
MODO DE PREPARO
Primeiro, pegue a lata de leite condensado, as gemas, a maisena e o leite.

Coloque no fogo e deixe até que fique um creme, reserve.

Coloque a segunda lata de leite condensado com um pouco de margarina e o chocolate.

Deixe no fogo até ficar um creme tipo brigadeiro.

Desligue o fogo e junte com o creme de leite.

MONTAGEM:
Coloque primeiro o creme branco.

Em seguida, mergulhe os biscoitos no leite e coloque sobre o creme branco.

Depois, coloque o creme preto e acrescente as raspas de chocolate sobre ele.

Deixe no congelador durante 2 horas.

My first paid steam game, and one of the best !
Play it for solo, or coop, both are awesome :D
I ended up gifting it to 3 friends when price was really low. And they like it too !
Probably the second best game I have ever played! Co-op is smooth and amazing as well, along with making custom maps!
według mnie Portal 2 jest bardzo fajną grą logiczną. zagadki dają dużo do myślenia a fabuła jest wciągająca!
Отличная игра, не только головоломка, но и интересный сюжет + юмор
Przyjemna gra. Gra bardzo ma fajną fabułę dzięki której można pograć w nią kilka razy! Muzyka w tej grze to złoto. Polecam.
광광 울었습니다. 존경합니다 감사합니다 포탈 제작진분들

O famoso jogo Portal 2, segue o mesmo raciocínio do primeiro jogo da franquia, Portal; mas ainda assim se destaca facilmente pela ótima quantidade de fases disponíveis, conteúdos criados por outros jogadores e a parte mais divertida do jogo: Multjogador Co-op. Possui gráficos muito bonitos, boa ambientação e novas mecânicas de Puzzles que enriquece ainda mais seu divertimento. Recomendo.
Amazing game 100% recommend spent many many hours playing this game back in the day on Xbox 360.
